name: Some Like It Hot
description: Some Like It Hot! is a combination management game and visual novel. You just started as the new Barista at the local Java Joint. You’ll be tasked with learning to make complex caffeinated concoctions and surviving those lunch time rushes, and during the downtimes, you’ll have a chance to meet the regulars and learn their stories. Will you be able to balance your new career and your new relationships? Will you find Brew Love?
